sn35.126:4.1: At one time the Buddha was staying near Nālandā in Pāvārika’s mango grove.
sn35.126:4.2: Then the householder Upāli went up to the Buddha …
sn35.126:4.4: “What is the cause, sir, what is the reason why some sentient beings aren’t fully extinguished in the present life?
sn35.126:4.5: What is the cause, sir, what is the reason why some sentient beings are fully extinguished in the present life?” …
sn35.126:4.6: (This should be told in full as in the previous discourse.)
